title: Kenny Pickett QB1, Revisiting Fearless Predictions, & TNF Preview
itunes:title: Kenny Pickett QB1, Revisiting Fearless Predictions, & TNF Preview
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, and Colleen Wolfe bring you all the latest news from around the league, starting with Mike Tomlin naming Kenny Pickett the starting quarterback for the Steelers (11:24). Dak Prescott is still having trouble gripping the football (17:06), the Dolphins are under investigation for the handling of Tua Tagovailoa's injury (20:35), and Tom Brady and Gisele Bündchen have reportedly hired a divorce attorney (25:10). Then, the heroes revisit their fearless predictions for October 4th from late July (26:50). Finally, we close the show previewing Colts at Broncos, which kicks off on Thursday night (44:03).

Note: timecodes approximate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
